Title: When the dining hall is well-run, the production spirit will increase
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Collective dining halls provide food for the members of the people's communes. They do not have to cook for themselves anymore - thus saving time that can be spent working the fields.The characters on the lanterns: 人民公社好 - People's communes are good.This poster is a print from the third impression (February 1959).
